---
title: Vendor Examples
description: Contoh implementasi dan penggunaan Vendor API
---

# Vendor Examples

## Search Vendors

```javascript
async function searchVendors(category, minScore = 80) {
  const params = new URLSearchParams({
    kategori: category,
    status: 'aktif',
    min_score: minScore,
    limit: 20
  });
  
  const response = await fetch(
    `https://api.inaproc.id/v1/vendor/penyedia?${params}`,
    {
      headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_TOKEN' }
    }
  );
  
  return response.json();
}

// Find qualified IT vendors
const itVendors = await searchVendors('IT', 85);
console.log(`Found ${itVendors.data.length} qualified IT vendors`);
```

## Evaluate Vendor Performance

```python
import requests

def evaluate_vendor(vendor_id, project_id, scores, notes):
    url = "https://api.inaproc.id/v1/vendor/evaluasi"
    
    payload = {
        "vendor_id": vendor_id,
        "project_id": project_id,
        "evaluator_id": "USER-001",
        "kriteria": scores,
        "catatan": notes
    }
    
    headers = {
        "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_TOKEN",
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    }
    
    response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
    return response.json()

# Submit evaluation
evaluation = evaluate_vendor(
    vendor_id="VDR-001",
    project_id="PRJ-001", 
    scores={
        "kualitas": 85,
        "ketepatan_waktu": 90,
        "layanan": 88,
        "inovasi": 75
    },
    notes="Vendor completed project successfully with good quality"
)

print(f"Evaluation submitted: {evaluation['evaluation_id']}")
```

## Monitor Vendor Performance

```javascript
class VendorMonitor {
  constructor(apiKey) {
    this.apiKey = apiKey;
    this.baseUrl = 'https://api.inaproc.id/v1/vendor';
  }

  async getTopPerformers(category, limit = 10) {
    const response = await fetch(
      `${this.baseUrl}/penyedia?kategori=${category}&status=aktif&sort=skor_kinerja&order=desc&limit=${limit}`,
      { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}` } }
    );
    return response.json();
  }

  async checkPerformanceAlerts() {
    const response = await fetch(
      `${this.baseUrl}/monitoring/alerts`,
      { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}` } }
    );
    
    const alerts = await response.json();
    
    alerts.data.forEach(alert => {
      if (alert.type === 'performance_decline') {
        console.log(`⚠️  Vendor ${alert.vendor_name} performance declined to ${alert.current_score}`);
      }
    });
  }

  async generatePerformanceReport(vendorId) {
    const response = await fetch(
      `${this.baseUrl}/penyedia/${vendorId}/kinerja`,
      { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}` } }
    );
    
    const performance = await response.json();
    
    return {
      vendor_id: vendorId,
      overall_score: performance.data.skor_keseluruhan,
      project_count: performance.data.statistik.total_project,
      success_rate: performance.data.statistik.success_rate,
      recommendation: performance.data.skor_keseluruhan >= 80 ? 'Recommended' : 'Review Required'
    };
  }
}

// Usage
const monitor = new VendorMonitor('YOUR_API_KEY');

// Get top IT vendors
const topIT = await monitor.getTopPerformers('IT');
console.log('Top IT Vendors:', topIT.data.map(v => v.nama));

// Check for alerts
monitor.checkPerformanceAlerts();
```

## Vendor Comparison

```javascript
async function compareVendors(vendorIds) {
  const comparisons = await Promise.all(
    vendorIds.map(async (id) => {
      const response = await fetch(
        `https://api.inaproc.id/v1/vendor/penyedia/${id}/kinerja`,
        { headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_TOKEN' } }
      );
      return response.json();
    })
  );

  return comparisons.map(comp => ({
    vendor_id: comp.data.vendor_id,
    score: comp.data.skor_keseluruhan,
    projects: comp.data.statistik.total_project,
    success_rate: comp.data.statistik.success_rate
  })).sort((a, b) => b.score - a.score);
}

// Compare multiple vendors
const comparison = await compareVendors(['VDR-001', 'VDR-002', 'VDR-003']);
console.log('Vendor Ranking:', comparison);
```
